sentence: Both the view out to the ocean the direct beach access the space in the suite was I feel well worth the extra you pay compared with standard rooms however all benefit from the sea view
Rate from Hotelscom was great and used my free nights to stay for almost nothing at this truly 5 star resort
And this is all included in the price of your stay
Best location on the West Coast excluding Sandy Lane which is ridiculously expensive
It is obviously pricey but it delivers a very pleasant relaxing location for a holiday
Overall the hotel charges so much because of the great beach location next to Lonestar quiet and on the prestigious west coast of Barbados
Some staff members were kind and efficient but in general I expected more for the rate I paid for
I know I am not upper class customer but I have no problem with paying much for a meal provided I get something exceptional

StartersI had a coconut and tomato soup which was lovely just the right flavours with a touch of spice and a delicious bread roll to go with it even if the bread roll was the size of a new born babys handMainFor mains I had a lamb cutlet meal where I was presented the two toughest bits of meat iv ever eaten in my life it was like chewing on Mike Tysons foot which were also presented with two tesco value meat samosas all for the whopping price of 90 safe to say I was not impressed with this

The main bar is good and well stocked cocktail prices are high but this not unexpected I do wish someone had told us there was a happy hour each day between 5 and 6 pm thoughConcierge services often overlooked but the staff at this desk were superb and arranged an excellent catamaran trip for us when we were picked up from our hotel beach
Only down fall is the food is very expensive but extremely filling
Not what we expect for what we pay to stay here
they the politicians the cost cutters the up sellers need to be wary in case the no longer will pay the prices for an ordinary experience
The quality of this hotel has dropped prices at the restaurant are very high and do not match the fare being offered
You are only hotel who charged me 100 upfront payment
However while we appreciated this gesture we did not feel that butler service etc was enough to justify the substantial increase on the price normally charged for identical rooms on the second floor

I found that management not honoring our original booking rate to be horrible customer service and a poor reflection of the hotel and their values especially since the staff told us that the room was available
The hotel is expensive BUT WE STILL LOVE IT and will no doubt return
If you ’ve not been to Barbados before the prices take your breath away
the price did not remotely reflect the product presented
